panels.description:
This is in reality the change in neo4j ids.
If the transaction is rolled-back nodes will not be created but will increase this gauge.

Maximum speed is set to 30k nodes/sec
Empirically we saw this is the maximum handled by the production machine

Empirically we saw this is the maximum handled by the production machine
